Title: Surf Nazis Must Die
Writer: Jon Ayre (screenplay), Peter George (original story), Jon Ayre (original story)
Actors: Gail Neely, Robert Harden, Barry Brenner, Dawn Wildsmith
Plot: When the son of a gun-wielding woman is murdered by neo-Nazi surf punks in the post-apocalyptic future, his Mama hunts them down for some bloodthirsty revenge.
